author: Special Correspondent
text:
With the objective of creating an awareness among children of conserving environment, the Bell Matriculation Higher Secondary School organised a ‘Cycling Festival’ on its premises at Palayamkottai on Wednesday.

Slow and speed cycle races in various categories were conducted for the children as part of the event. The children were explained the pollution being caused by motor vehicles, the need for conserving environment and the advantages of using bicycles every day.

TI Cycles and Just Buy Cycles, Chennai, presented the winners six bicycles.
title: ‘Cycling Festival’ at Bell School
